name: 7f500c0c-0d5d-5652-8b1e-ad363927b494
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Mace Head, Ireland (20110101 - 20140101). The observations contain level 1 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Mace Head, Ireland (20110101 - 20140101)
